rules.text: At the start of the Fight phase, select one Ka’tah Stance from the list below to be active for your army until the end of the phase. While a Ka’tah Stance is active for your army, each unit from your army with this ability gains the relevant ability.
Each time a melee attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
Melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
Adeptus Custodes models from your army have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength and has not been selected to fight this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. If that unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that is within range of an objective marker.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Fights First ability.

rules.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or 2CP the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units).
rules.effect: One destroyed model (excluding Character models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.
rules.restrictions: You cannot target the same unit with this Stratagem more than once per battle.

rules.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) within range of an objective marker you control.
rules.effect: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

list: Adeptus Custodes model only (excluding Anathema Psykana models). Each time the bearer ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.
Once per battle, after the bearer’s unit ends a Charge move, all enemy units within 6" of the bearer must take a Battle-shock test.
Adeptus Custodes model only (excluding Anathema Psykana models). The bearer has a Leadership characteristic of 5+.
Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly Adeptus Custodes unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of the bearer; that unit is no longer Battle-shocked.
Adeptus Custodes model only (excluding Anathema Psykana models). Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons.
Once per battle, at the start of any Command phase, triple the bearer’s Objective Control characteristic until the end of the turn.
Adeptus Custodes model only (excluding Anathema Psykana models). The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Once per battle, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of the bearer, if the bearer’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

special.title: Stand Vigil
special.text: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

special.title: While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead
Sentinel Storm
special.text: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.

special.title: Praesidium Shield
special.text: Add 1 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

special.title: Vexilla
special.text: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 sentinel blade and 1
1 model’s guardian spear can be replaced with one of the following

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: These warriors form the backbone of the shield companies, and every
one is a terrifying force of destruction equal to the strongest of the
foe. Whether armed with guardian spear or sentinel blade, their shots
are perfectly placed, and every cut, thrust and parry is a masterclass

special.title: Resolute Will
special.text: While a Character is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

special.title: Living Fortress
special.text: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

special.title: Vexilla
special.text: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 castellan axe.
1 model can be equipped with 1 vexilla.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: Veterans with centuries of service, Custodian Wardens are
level-headed warriors who have sworn to fight as living fortresses
no foe shall breach. With frightening intensity and wills of iron, these
warriors cleave their foes in two with immense sweeps that are driven

special.title: Slayers of Tyrants
special.text: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Character, Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

special.title: From Golden Light
special.text: Once per battle, at the end of your opponenet's turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield.

special.title: In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models
Vexilla
special.text: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 castellan axe.
1 model’s guardian spear can be replaced with 1 vexilla and 1 misericordia.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: Even amongst the Adeptus Custodes, Allarus Custodians are renowned for
their deeds. Teleporting into the most dangerous enemy strongholds, they
rely upon the indomitable resilience of their Terminator plate to protect
them as they hunt down demagogues and generals. Fighting as individual
heroes, they swiftly tear the heart from their foe’s defence.

special.title: FACTION
special.text: Martial Ka'tah Turbo-boost: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll.

special.title: Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit
Quicksilver Execution
special.text: Once per battle, after this unit ends an Advance move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding Monster and Vehicle units) that it moved over during that move, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: Any number of models can each have their salvo launcher replaced with 1 Vertus hurricane bolter.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: Veteran warriors who have seen battle on a hundred worlds, these
Custodians know that the value of speed is in directing their might
precisely where and when it is needed most. Master combatants and
marksmen both, they can place piercing strikes and deadly salvoes
with precision even when travelling at immense speeds.

special.title: Daughters of the Abyss
special.text: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

special.title: Purity of Execution
special.text: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Psyker unit, that attack has the [PRECISION] and [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] abilities.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: Protected from the malevolence of witches by their rare anti-psychic
mutation, and shielded from the bullets and blades of the foe by their
finely crafted power armour, Prosecutors advance unflinching into the
heart of battle. Their bolters thunder ceaselessly, each explosive shell

special.title: Daughters of the Abyss
special.text: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

special.title: Deft Parry
special.text: Each time a melee attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: The surest way to bring an end to a witch’s malefic rampage is to
strike their head from their body. Such is the doctrine of the Vigilators,
who ghost across the battlefield before charging headlong into battle,
their double-handed power blades singing a keening song of death.

Each time this unit shoots, after it has
shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of

special.title: CORE
special.text: Scouts 6" Daughters of the Abyss: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

special.title: Sanctified Flames
special.text: Each time this unit shoots, after it has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: Witchseekers wield sanctified flamers as they hunt witches through
tangled corridors and muddy trenchworks alike. Closing with their
heretical quarry, they unleash a roaring conflagration to immolate the
foe, as well as any pyre.

special.title: Master of the Stances
special.text: At the start of the Fight phase, select one Ka'tah Stance. Until the end of the phase, that stance is active for this model's unit in addition to the one that is active.

special.title: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, all stances are active for this model's unit until the end of the phase
Strategic Mastery
special.text: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability. That model's unit can be targeted with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already targeted another unit from your army this phase.

special.title: Praesidium shield
special.text: Add 1 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model’s guardian spear can be replaced with one of the following

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units
Shield-Captains are among the greatest warriors in the Imperium.
No matter which weapons they wield, they display absolute mastery
of them. Their tactical and strategic abilities know few peers, and
they read the ebb and flow of a war at a glance before directing their

special.title: Martial Inspiration
special.text: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

special.title: In addition, once per battle, this model's unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced
Legacy of Combat
special.text: You can target this model's unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

footnotes.footnotes: Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units
A Blade Champion is a living weapon in the Emperor’s hand. His role is
to identify the greatest battlefield threat - be that a mighty leader, a
host of killers or a deadly war engine - then to employ his archeotech
blades and specialised fighting styles to ensure their swift and

special.title: Tenacious Spirit
special.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.

special.title: Daughter of the Abyss
special.text: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units
Aleya is a veteran of her order and is a ferocious and dedicated
hunter of witches and sorcerers. Over many years she has developed
incredible tactical perception, as well as a deep knowledge of her
quarry. She employs these skills to seek out rogue psykers, cutting
them down with sweeps of her blade, Somnus.

ranged.name: One Shot
ranged.range: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

core: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+
At the start of your Command phase, this model

special.title: CORE
special.text: Deadly Demise D3 Daughters of the Abyss: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

special.title: Self Repair
special.text: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.

wargear.title: TRANSPORT
values: This model has a transport capacity of 12
The Rhinos of the Silent Sisterhood are more than just armoured
personnel carriers. Many have served the Imperium for hundreds,
if not thousands of years. Highly rugged vehicles, their spacious
capacity and powerful engines help them to safely carry their deadly
cargo of Sisters into the fiercest of battles.

core: While this model is leading a unit, add 2"
to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and add 2 to
Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of

special.title: Daughter of the Abyss

special.title: Corner the Quarry
special.text: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles ) that is within Engagement Range of this model's unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test.

special.title: When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units
Knight-Centuras are the leaders of Sisters of Silence cadres and the
guardians of their traditions. They have earned the respect of their
Sisters through years of service, impeccable fighting skills, immense
power as Nulls and encyclopaedic knowledge of the witch and

special.title: Defiant to the Last
special.text: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play.

special.title: The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play
Strategic Mastery
special.text: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model's unit with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already been used on another unit from your army this phase.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model’s guardian spear can be replaced with 1 castellan axe.

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following unit
A Shield-Captain is already one of the most formidable combatants
and superlative strategists in the Imperium. When clad in a nigh-on
impenetrable suit of auramite Terminator armour, they become more
powerful still - a walking fortress of Imperial might able to teleport
directly into battle in a blaze of golden light.

special.title: Sweeping Advance
special.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit Consolidates, each model in that unit can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

special.title: In addition, once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, if this model's unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can Fall Back as if it were your Movement phase or, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move as if it were your Movement phase
Strategic Mastery
special.text: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model's unit with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already been used on another unit from your army this phase.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model’s salvo launcher can be replaced with 1 Vertus hurricane bolter.

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following unit
All Shield-Captains are decisive warriors who suffer no impediment to
their mission. Those Shield-Captains swiftest in thought and action
soar into battle on Dawneagle jetbikes, plunging into the heart of the
foe. Though these warriors appear arrogant, this is far from true - their
self-assuredness is matched entirely by their skill.

core: Deep Strike, Feel No Pain 5+, Leader

special.title: Captain-General
special.text: While this model is leading a unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in that unit and/or to any roll or test made for models in that unit (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

special.title: Moment Shackle
special.text: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following to take effect until the end of the phase: ■ This model's Watcher's Axe melee weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 12.

special.title: ■ This model has a 2+ invulnerable save
■ Models in this model's unit have the Fights First ability

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units

special.title: Golden Laurels
special.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

special.title: Hero of Lion's Gate
special.text: Once per battle round, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model.

special.title: In addition, once per battle, after making a Hit roll, Wound roll or saving throw for this model, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6

wargear.title: LEADER
values: This model can be attached to the following units
A headstrong warrior, Valerian is relatively new to the Custodes, but
is already marked for greatness. His urge to bring death to the foes
of the Emperor beyond Terra is much valued in these dark times, and
countless enemies have fallen to his guardian spear, Gnosis.

special.title: Unyielding Ancient
special.text: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability.

special.title: Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6
special.text: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model’s multi-melta can be replaced with 1 Kheres-pattern assault cannon.

wargear.title: UNIT COMPOSITION
values: These towering combat walkers are piloted by centuries-old fallen
heroes kept alive by irreplaceable technologies. Equipped with
weapons that can melt armour and tear apart infantry, Venerable
Contemptor Dreadnoughts inflict terrible damage, all while protected
by atomantic shields and auto-repair protocols.

ranged.name: One Shot
ranged.range: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

special.title: Assault Ramp
special.text: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

special.title: DAMAGED
special.text: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
This model can be equipped with 1 storm bolter.

wargear.title: TRANSPORT
values: This model has a transport capacity of 6
Land Raiders are heavily armed, mobile fortresses. Possessed of
hyper-durable adamantine armour and a fearsome array of weapons,
they and their cargo of Custodian warriors can turn the tide of war in a
single salvo, and their machine spirits are so potent they can fight on
even if the crew are slain.
